npc_output: I'm a messenger, nice to meet you!
I'm a bit bored, to be honest, but I love reading and magic.
Actually, could you help me with |r3|?
It's great, thanks for asking! The sunny weather is perfect for it.
Not much, just enjoying the evening. I'm a carpenter, by the way.
I'd love to, but I'm a bit anxious about my upcoming performance.
I'm a miner, and I'm on my way to |r1|.
It's going well, thanks. As a priest, I'm always happy to help others.
Just out for a walk, enjoying the morning. I'm a servant, nice to meet you.
Actually, could you help me with |r5|?
